action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you dont book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information:
Please note that credit card information is required upon booking for guarantee purposes only. The credit card will be pre-authorized for the full booking rate at least 7 days prior to arrival, but no charges will be made prior to check-in. Guests are required to make full payment upon checking in.

===
Up to 2 children under 6 years old stay free of charge when using existing beds.
Children from 6 to 11 years old are charged VND 250,000 net per night when using existing beds, with breakfast.
Children from 6 to 11 years old are charged VND 600,000 net per night on extra beds, with breakfast.
Children from 12 years old and any extra adult are charged VND 950,000 net per night on extra beds, with breakfast.

===
The compulsory meal is not included in the room rate and will be surcharged upon guest check-in at the hotel on 30 Apr to 02 May 2021, 02 Sep to 04 Sep 2021, 24 Dec 2021, and 31 Dec 2021.

In accordance with government guidelines to minimize transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary, and other relevant info on dates where such guidelines exist.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 2 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 2 days before arrival.

All children are welcome. Up to two children under 6 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
Up to two children from 6 to 12 year are charged  VND 250000 per night when using existing beds.
One child under 2 years stays free of charge in a crib.
One child under 12 years is charged VND 600000  per night in an extra bed.
One older child or adult is charged VND 950000  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 6.
The maximum number of cribs in a room is 1.
Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in public areas and is free of charge.
Free public parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation in the 2 days before arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
